root.name: Fire & Ice
root.description: Â Fire Ice a platformer about a Coyote running through icy lands, hurling ice cubes at enemies which eventually freezes them upon when they can be smashed by the Coyote (think Bubble Bobble). Make sure to collect all parts of the key to the next level on your way. There is also the usual array of helpful power ups to be collected on the way, such as snowflakes and mini-coyotes.
